amendment.description: Amendment to allow for sufficient time (at least 90 days) for affected entities to take steps to comply with issued guidance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 115-2 to allow for sufficient time (at least 90 days) for affected entities to take steps to comply with issued guidance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (IA) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Young (IA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (IA) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
